issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: cxf-java2ws-plugin command too long (because of -cp argument)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Trying to build trunk as user "administrator" is failing in - native-maven-plugin/hadoop common; command line too long. By the look of things, its the number of artifacts from the maven repository which is filling up the line; the CP really needs to go in a file instead, assuming the maven plugin will let us.
fields.summary: Windows build fails "command line too long"

he command line is too long.
INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
INFO] Reactor Summary:
INFO]
INFO] Apache Hadoop Main ................................. SUCCESS [  1.339 s]
INFO] Apache Hadoop Build Tools .......................... SUCCESS [  3.305 s]

INFO] Apache Hadoop Common ............................... FAILURE [ 23.633 s]
{code}
Looks like latest version of the native plugin has the option {{useEnvClasspath}} to set the CP in the {{CLASSPATH}} var; calls out windows as the reason

We still see this issue in Windows for trunk:
